task.title: How to be Involved on Campus
task.shortdesc: Now that you have made new friends and showed off your knowledge in class, you would like to join some organizations and test your skills in the "real world" of campus.

taskbody.context: This task will require you to go to different organizations on campus to find the perfect fit for you and your interests. The following steps will walk you through one of the ways you can get involved.

step.cmd: Go to Gobblerfest at Virginia Tech (Figure 1).
Walk around and look at all of the clubs and activities being offered.
Find one that catches your interest. For example, Statistics or English Club.
Talk to the students about their club or organization.
Go to the club meetings once you receive their information.
